title: Probing partially localized supergravity background of fundamental string ending on Dp-brane
abstract: We study the dynamics of the probe fundamental string in the field background of the partially localized supergravity solution for the fundamental string ending on Dp-brane. We separately analyze the probe dynamics for its motion along the worldvolume direction and the transverse direction of the source Dp-brane. We compare the dynamics of the probe along the Dp-brane worldvolume direction to the BIon dynamics.
